item.title: Site Maintenance
item.description: Site Maintenance Services Ensuring your website stays in tip-top shape is my specialty. I offer comprehensive site maintenance services to keep your online space running smoothly, hassle-free. Here’s a breakdown of what I do: 1. Regular Backups I perform routine backups of your website, securing your valuable content. With backups in place, we’re ready for anything, from unexpected issues to future updates. 2. Software Updates Keeping your site’s software up to date is crucial for security and performance.
